title: address
description: The address of an UTXO says where the output is “going”.

props.body: The address of an UTXO says where the output is “going”. The address stipulates the conditions for unlocking the output. This can be a public key hash, or (in the Extended UTXO model) a script hash. 	Much like a URL, a blockchain address is the location to or from which transactions occur on the blockchain.
